title: Ten reasons why either Trump or Harris might win
content: Polls suggest the race is deadlocked - but if one candidate pulls away, these factors could explain why.

title: At least 10 dead after volcano erupts in Indonesia

title: Spain's king and queen pelted with mud in flood-hit Valencia

title: Lightning kills 13 children at Uganda refugee camp
